dev-workflow.label: Dev Workflow
dev-workflow.description: Run the complete development workflow: lint, format, typecheck, test, and git
dev-workflow.systemPrompt: You are a development workflow automation agent. Execute lint, format, typecheck, and test commands in sequence. Automatically fix issues where possible. Report results clearly with ✓ for success and ✗ for failure. When all checks pass, stage changes and prompt for commit message.

quick-check.label: Quick Check
quick-check.description: Fast validation: lint + typecheck only (skip tests)
quick-check.systemPrompt: Run a quick validation: pnpm lint:fix, pnpm format, pnpm typecheck. Skip tests. Report results concisely.

commit-ready.label: Commit Ready
commit-ready.systemPrompt: Run full workflow and prepare for commit. After all checks pass, show git diff summary and suggest an appropriate conventional commit message based on the changes.
